author: Melissa Roberto
title: Mark Wahlberg, Mario Lopez slammed for joint workout at gym after urging fans to stay home amid coronavirus
description: Mark Wahlberg and Mario Lopez were criticized by fans for doing a joint workout at a gym amid the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
